name: aos-blocks
description: Adds AOS animation controls to Gutenberg blocks.

scripts.build: npm run build:css && npm run build:js
scripts.build:dist: npm run build && npm run build:dist:prepare && npm run build:dist:copy
scripts.build:dist:copy: cp aos-blocks.php dist/ && mkdir -p dist/assets/js && mkdir -p dist/assets/css && cp assets/js/aos-blocks.bundle.js dist/assets/js/ && cp assets/css/aos-blocks.css dist/assets/css/ && cd dist && zip -r aos-blocks.zip .

author: Knol Aust
